title: Not generating new account
body:
Hi there,

I am trying to generate a new account it asks the password, and after that it frezee, only on the pop up window.

Also on the main window in develop menu, ethereum node appears sometimes, usually is not there

#### System information

Geth version: `1.8.11`
OS & Version: Windows/
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour
Generate the new wallet and able to see the GETH version

#### Actual behaviour
Never generate the new wallet and the GETH version is not always there.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
open the wallet and go to generate new account

#### Backtrace

````

[2018-07-18T21:43:46.400] [ERROR] (ui: popupWindow) - connection not open on send()````
This seems to be a `mist` issue, not related to `go-ethereum`. Please open an issue on their tracker https://github.com/ethereum/mist/issues
